amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to allocate an additional $100 million for Army Corps of Engineers construction projects related to flood control.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A042) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A042) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
